page.title: 05Farming
page.content: Frank Redman and Sons, Potato Merchants, College & Hillside Farms, Gravenhurst. Total hectares - ll6.9 Soil type - heavy, with clay Land at Upper Gravenhurst, Campton, Lower Gravenhurst, Barton and Pulloxhill. At present set in Grain 86.l hectares Peas 6.8 Rape l2.l Market Gardening 8.9 Woodlands 0.2 Roads and buildings 2.8 Grain grown is wheat and barley. Market gardening produce is cabbage, lettuce and brussels. 2 full time lorry driver on contract to Beds C.C/ 3 full time land workers, 2 drivers, 2 part-time workers, 2 part-time clerical staff.
